name: NoMail
tagline: A code to stop people from sharing the email on forums, comments, etc.
body:
### Welcome to NoMail by @kingofepicness.
NoMail stops people from sharing their email in forums comments and other public places.

Example: My email is name@example.com
Would become: My email is name**********

### Why should I use it?
It is one of the simplest codes you can use and  

### Authors and Contributors
@ClappingDJ helped add more email providers to the block list.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
